elems.code:
{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all c: Course | all p: Project | all disj s1, s2: Student | 
  		p in s1.projects and
  		p in s2.projects and
  		p in c.projects implies
  		(
          c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2].next or
          c.grades[s2] = c.grades[s1].next or
          c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or
          c.grades[s1] = none or
          c.grades[s2] = none
        )
}

{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all c: Course | all p: Project | all disj s1, s2: Student | 
  		p in s1.projects and
  		p in s2.projects and
  		p in c.projects implies
  		(
          c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2].next or
          c.grades[s2] = c.grades[s1].next or
          c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or
          c.grades[s1] = none or
          c.grades[s2] = none
        )
 
}

{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all disj s1, s2: Student |
  		all p: Project |
  			(p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects) implies 
  				(one c: Course |
  					p in c.projects and 
  					(c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or
                      c.grades[s1] = next[c.grades[s2]]
                      or c.grades[s2] = next[c.grades[s1]]))
}

{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all disj s1, s2: Student |
  		all p: Project |
  			(p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects) implies 
  				(some c: Course |
  					p in c.projects and 
  					(c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or
                      c.grades[s1] = next[c.grades[s2]]
                      or c.grades[s2] = next[c.grades[s1]]))
}

{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all s1, s2: Student |
  		all p: Project |
  			(p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects) implies 
  				(some c: Course |
  					p in c.projects and 
  					(c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or
                      c.grades[s1] = next[c.grades[s2]]
                      or c.grades[s2] = next[c.grades[s1]]))
}

{
	    all c: Course |
        all p: Project |
            p in c.projects =>
                all disj s1, s2: Student |
                    (p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects) =>
                        let g1 = c.grades[s1], g2 = c.grades[s2] |
                            g1 != none and g2 != none and 
                            (g1 = g2 or g1 in g2.~next or g2 in g1.~next)
}

{
	    all c: Course |
        all p: Project |
            (p in c.projects and 
             some disj s1, s2: Student | 
                (p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects and 
                 ((c.grades[s1] = next[c.grades[s2]]) or 
                  (c.grades[s2] = next[c.grades[s1]]) or 
                  (c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2]))))
}

{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all disj s1, s2: Student |
  		(all p: Project | p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects implies (
                some c: Course | 
                    p in c.projects and 
                    s1 in c.grades.Person and 
                    s2 in c.grades.Person and 
                     (
                        c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or 
                        c.grades[s1] = next[c.grades[s2]] or 
                        c.grades[s2] = next[c.grades[s1]]
                    )))
}

{
	// Students working on the same project in a course cannot have marks differing by more than one unit
	all disj s1, s2: Student |
  		(all p: Project | p in s1.projects and p in s2.projects implies (
                some c: Course | 
                    p in c.projects and 
                    s1 in c.grades.Grade and 
                    s2 in c.grades.Grade and 
                     (
                        c.grades[s1] = c.grades[s2] or 
                        c.grades[s1] = next[c.grades[s2]] or 
                        c.grades[s2] = next[c.grades[s1]]
                    )))
}
